Reviews.Author: Randy "Micro Image's opinion"
Reviews.Content: Works great. If you're looking for a iPad replacement.. $99 is not going to get you one. If you want a speedy pad with a great display that you don't have to guard with your life, if its lost or broken - this is a great one. We just bought a 2nd one today. Just remember, it's $99. Amazing.
Reviews.Title: More than I expected for the price. A real asset for the family.

Reviews.Author: tedlar mckennis
Reviews.Content: Great Tablet.  Just wish the following things were better.1.  Resolution - 800x600 is OK but needs to be improved to display much brighter and sharper pictures2. Connectivity -  Wished we could insert a sim card so that I can have  Internet from a Mobile carrierOther than that it performs great and it is a great entry level tablet
Reviews.Title: Kocaso M M870 8-Inch 8 GB Tablet

Reviews.Author: Tammy L. Guerriero "TG"
Reviews.Content: Got it for my mom for Christmas, unboxed and opened it to set it up for her, but it gave me no problems. It's quick, and has good audio and video. I'd buy it again.
Reviews.Title: So far so good
